login.title: Log In
login.hint: You will be redirected to <1>SEIUE</1> to log in.
login.privacy: SEIUE is a product operated by Beijing Yuehuo Education Technology Limited. By continuing to log in, you indicate your agreement to SEIUE's terms and conditions. Whale Cafe will receive basic information about your account, and won't be able to access your password or other account information.
